About.Hours & facilities: Open Tues-Fri 9am-4pm, Mon by appointment; closed weekends and public holidays. Copying service available for photographs from historic photographs collection. Introductory brochure available.

About.Access: For access to the stored collections or for research access, advance notice of visit required by telephone indicating research interest.

About.Acquisition focus: Material concerning Macleay family, or their collectors, especially their natural history activities. Some original material with mostly copies of documents in Public Record Office, Kew, London and Linnean Society of London.
